examples: single parents constitute a great proportion of the poor
synonyms: compose "farmers constituted 10 percent of the population"

definitions.definition: (of people or things) combine to form (a whole).
examples: there were enough members present to constitute a quorum
his failure to act constituted a breach of duty
synonyms: be regarded as "this constitutes a breach of copyright"

definitions.definition: give legal or constitutional form to (an institution); establish by law.
examples: inaugurate, establish, initiate, found, create, set up, start, form, organize, develop; Morecommission, charter, invest, appoint, install, empower "the courts were constituted in 1875"Morecommission, charter, invest, appoint, install, empower the courts were constituted in 1875
